result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Kendo L Ivy

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Kendo L Ivy in court.  
Attorney Sarah Zwach in court for Kendo L Ivy.  
Attorney Samuel E. Simpson in court for State of Wisconsin. 

Case calendared for a Plea and Sentencing.
Defense requesting an adjournment for reasons stated to the court.
Court grants one last adjournment and ordered case adjourned.
Case remains calendared in Branch 19.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for January 12, 2023 at 02:30 pm.
Received and filed: Justice Point Supervision Report.
Received and Filed. Pretrial Services Violation Report 7-14-2022

HELD OFF RECORD WITH APPROVAL OF JUDGE KIES. 

Off record discussions held. Due to Court congestion case is adjourned.  Pursuant to Chief Judge Directive 22-04, parties are hereby notified that as of July 30, 2022, this case will be assigned to Branch 6, Judge Ellen Brostrom, in Room 608 of the Courthouse. Parties notified.

Defendant Kendo L Ivy in court with attorney Sarah Zwach.  William R. F. Ackell appeared for the State of Wisconsin for Samuel Simpson.  Defense requested a date for plea and sentencing.    Pursuant to Chief Judge Directive 22-04, parties are hereby notified that as of July 30, 2022, this case will be assigned to Branch 6, Judge Ellen Brostrom, in Room 608 of the Courthouse.  mn  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 29, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Pretrial Services Supervision Report 5-25-2022, Filed.

Defendant Kendo L Ivy in court with attorney Sarah Zwach.  Samuel E. Simpson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for a scheduling conference. Defense has discovery and requests an additional scheduling conference date. Case adjourned to Branch 45.  Scheduling conference scheduled for May 25, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Received and Filed. Pretrial Services Supervision Report 5-3-2022

Defendant Kendo L Ivy in court with Attorney Sarah Zwach; both appear by video.  Abby Rockendorf appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Court took judicial notice of 21CF4221. Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: Wauwatosa Officer B. Ziegler.  State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.  Case is adjourned to Branch 45.  Scheduling conference scheduled for May 4, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Pretrial Services Supervision Report 4-20-2022, Filed.

Request for Substitution of Judge received and filed.  Court consented to substitution against Judge Wagner.  Parties are advised the Clerk of Circuit Court reassigned case pursuant to current court rules to Judge Kies, Br. 45.

Defendant Kendo L Ivy in court with Attorney Sarah Zwach; both appear by video.  Samantha Raygo appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.
Case set for Status. Matter should have been set for a preliminary hearing.   Court ordered case adjourned for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 20, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Report received and filed.
Proposed Order Appointing Attorney at County Expense

Defendant Kendo L Ivy in court.  Samuel E. Simpson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.
Indigency hearing proceeded.  Public defenders office has not apointed counsel at this time.  The court found the defendant eligible for appointment of counsel at county expense.  The court appointed Attorney Sarah Zwach to represent the defendant; counsel to be paid at the rate of $100.00 per hour.  Order Appointing Attorney at County Expense signed and filed.  Status conference scheduled for March 16, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Report received and filed.
Court extended SCRAM Bracelet for an additional 60 Days.

Defendant Kendo L Ivy in court.  Samuel E. Simpson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy Court Clerk: STW
Case set for Status Conference. Defendant has not been appointed counsel yet. Court instructed the defendant to go to the public defender's office. Court ordered case adjourned, Branch 38.  Status conference scheduled for March 8, 2022 at 08:15 am.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Defendant Kendo L Ivy in court.  Samuel E. Simpson appeared for the State of Wisconsin. All parties appear via zoom.   Deputy Court Clerk: STW
CASE HELD VIA ZOOM. Case set for Status Conference. Defendant has not been appointed counsel yet. Court ordered defendant to contact public defender's office regarding appointment. Case adjourned, Branch 38.  Status conference scheduled for March 1, 2022 at 08:15 am.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Report received and filed.
Status conference on February 11, 2022 at 08:15 am.

Defendant Kendo L Ivy in court in person.  Matthew Zisi appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. SPD has not appointed counsel. This matter will be adjourned to the trial court along with the defendants lower pending matter 21CF4221. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE.  Status conference scheduled for February 11, 2022 at 08:15 am.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

22RM003071  Actual Date Bond Posted with the Sheriffs Department:
01/22/22.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 4.  
The Court ordered defendant to maintain ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.  
Defendant to be monitored by portable breathalyzers.
  Scram bracelet ordered to monitor defendant maintains absolute sobriety.

Defendant Kendo L Ivy in court with attorney William Hotchkiss.  Defendant Kendo L Ivy in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Kendo L Ivy appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Wagner, Branch 38.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  Defense enters a plea of NOT GUILTY as to misdemeanor count 3.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  
This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for January 28, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
